songs.title: Marry Me
songs.lyrics:
In this short time
We have to live our lives
I want to spend
Every moment with you
To see you
And hold you
To feel your soul alive in mine
So I ask you
With no questions
Will you marry me?

I love the way
You hold me up when I'm down
And then you say
Comforts without a sound
To love you
And trust you
The way you keep my faith alive
So I ask you
With no questions
Will you marry me?

Will you marry me?
